review_title: Natural highlighter for pale skin, great for work!
review_content: Love this highlighter but it's definitely not for everyone. I'm very pale and cool-toned so the color is spot-on for me. It's a natural glow/shimmer so this is what I wear to work every day. I don't think you could build this up a ton and still look good, it's just not that type of highlighter. Also, I know some people complain about the size but personally I think you get plenty, it's not very easy to hit pan.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Blue', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Skin Type Normal']
review_content: I love this highlighter sooo much. Its super easy to work with and gives a gorgeus natural but glowy look. I usually wear it to school, but also when going out. user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Normal']
review_content:
I don’t know why I bought this, because powder highlighters never look natural on me - but this is perfect. Once I’ve washed, applied serum, sunscreen, sometimes primer, then foundation and setting powder, you need something to add back the natural glow you just erased with all those products. I dip a dense, fluffy brush into this product, and use it as a finishing powder. Adds a soft, subtle glow that never looks dry, sparkly, or settles into any texture. It reminds me of what I wanted Hourglass Ambient Powder “Diffused Light” to be...something to add a little radiance without looking as if I tried too hard. I have been pleasantly surprised with the results and will certainly repurchase this highlighter.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Hazel', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content:
I've had this product for a while, and would not quite describe it as a highlighter. It's more of a brightening powder and is great for adding some glimmer to the inner eyes, eyelids, and face in general. Since the formula is more of a powder, it kind of blends in and is very subtle. I would not recommend if you are looking for a highlighter to apply to the cheekbones. I have noticed this product makes me break out a little, so I have stopped using it as frequently, but there's no harm in putting a bit on every once in a while.

review_content:
I am very fair, and have always found highlighters to be just too much and too glittery my fair skin (and I work in an office with a very conservative dress code where a glittery face is a No No). I love that this highlighter is subtle enough that it doesn’t make my face scream that I’m wearing highlighter. It is so subtle and natural! I wear a little on the high points of my cheeks, brow one, and Cupid’s bow and it is just enough draw attention to the high points of my face. If you’re looking for a blinding highlight, this is not for you, but if you have fair skin and/or are going for a natural look, this is perfect. Not glittery, not blinding, but just a lovely, subtle, natural glow.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Olive', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content:
This is probably the most subtle highlighter I’ve found so far, which is a good thing for gals like me who favor a very natural makeup look. It says “nude-pink”, but I’m more tempted to describe it as simply “nude”, because on my light olive skin it really doesn’t have the same pink pigment that regular Dandelion powder has. The highlight to this is so subtle that I often dust it over my entire face like a setting powder if I’m going for a more dewy appearance. In the realm of Benefit highlighters, I would say this is more shimmery than Dandelion ShyBeam but less shimmery than both Watts Up and HighBeam. It also has a lovely, delicate scent like Dandelion...I know that some people dislike that...but I love it. I would recommend this product to anyone looking for a very fine highlighting powder offering a more subtle glow.
…read more

user_specs: ['Eye Color Green', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Porcelain', 'Skin Type Dry']
review_content:
I bought this product a few days ago and was very pleased. I have been using it even since. I thought the price point was a little high but I would still purchase again. I liked the peachy undertone and how it had such finely milled shimmer in it. It’s something you don’t normally see. The texture is so soft, kind of reminds me of the hourglass bronzers. I would recommend using a setting spray after application because otherwise you might have a powdery finish, and it will wear off within a few hours of wear time. Love it on my fair skin and found it easy to pick and choose whether you want a light natural highlight, or wanted more of a bold highlight. You can do so by spritzing the brush with setting spray for optimal pigment. Buying one for my daughter for her birthday, I know she’ll love it. Well don’t benefit!

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content:
I love this highlighter. It is very soft and natural. It gives a very subtle glow that is suitable for daily wear; e.g. work, day outing. It is definitely not a strong "popping" highlight. You can always layer this on though, to achieve a stronger highlight. I did find it a little expensive; however, it is worth it considering the highlight is very natural-looking and suits my skin tone. People think I am fresh and happy- no comments about how "popping" my highlighter is. They just think I had a lovely sleep and woke up fresh as a daisy. I'm not sure how this will look on darker skin tones.

I love how this smells!! I tried it on my hand at first and I wish it was as pigmented on my cheeks as it is on my hand. Still very pretty.
Love this highlighter! Makes my skin look flawless and sparkles!

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: Perfect for subtle glow during the day. Melts right into the skin and most days works as both highlighter and a blush.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Green', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: I have very fair skin so this is a really nice finish on me, it doesn't pop out as much as I'd like, and the brush does get covered with sparkles.
My favorite highlighter. I love a subtle highlight and this is perfect. Not to mention, the product smells amazing. Definitely recommend!!

user_specs: ['Age 18-24', 'Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Tan', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: if you want that natural glow and highlight, this is the product for you! I prefer a highlighter that is blinding, so I don't use this for my go to highlighter, but it's pretty under my brows. I love benefit cosmetics!

user_specs: ['Eye Color Blue', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: Perfect highlighter for a natural, dewy glow! Love the subtle scent as well.
Beautiful natural highlight! Perfect for everyday! I have a fair light skin tone and I'm in love!

This is a beautiful natural highlight. If you aren't into a 'blinding' highlighter or something too metallic and shimmery this will be perfect for you. It's a beautiful subtle highlighter, also nice on a bare face for a natural look. It gives you that glow from within look' Beautiful colour for fair-medium skin tone but unfortunately might be too light for tan to deep skin tones.. great product!

user_specs: ['Eye Color Blue', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Skin Type Oily']
review_content: i like this one a lot! at first i was disappointed because i thought the glow would be a bit more intense, but its okay because that just means its a great everyday wear highlighter!! it gives a nice and soft glow :)
I personally didn't like this product because when I put it on, it looked very sheer on my skin when I was trying to go for a more noticeable glow..

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Skin Type Oily']
review_content: Goes on light with a fan brush but Ian perfect for natural looks and can be layered to go on heavier

I have aging skin with dryness, rosacea, and texture, so highlighters often don't look nice on me. This one's gorgeously subtle and soft though. It's beautiful. The price seems a tad steep though for the crummy brush and cardboard packaging. It's cute, yeah, but not very durable or travel friendly. That's why I can only give it four stars. The product itself is fabulous!
so this highlighter is pretty good. but my one problem is the I've only been using it for a week and I can already see the bottom of the box.

I love this highlighter!!!!!! I usually hate highlighters because they look harsh and unatural but this highlight is perfect. From far away and in pictures it looks wet, it looks like you have that nice post gym glow in the right places! the brush is dumb but whatever
BEAUTIFUL. Gives the perfect glow. Don't bother using the brush it comes with - I've found the best way to apply it is with a dense eyeshadow blending brush.
This did not do anything! A total waste of money, I returned it. It gave very little shimmer and very little pigment even if I packed it on. Such a waste!

I'm a sucker for a good glow! When I heard my favorite brand was releasing a powder highlight, I got excited!! I got this when it first hit the shelves at my local Benefit store. It swatches beautifully! I use it everyday and always get compliments on my highlight when I wear it. You can swipe on a little for a natural glow or build it for a more glam glow. I use the brush it comes with or my Morphe 501 brush and it works perfectly. It even looks great overtop of a liquid highlight. I definitely will repurchase because I've hit pan.

I swatched it in the store and fell in love, but when I bought it it didn't seem as highlighty. Once you use it a couple times and soften up the powder it is stunning, it's natural yet blinding at the same time. I can wear this on a minimal makeup day or a full face of makeup day. It's a beautiful peachy pinky highlighter that isn't glittery or sparkly, it just looks like your skin is beaming, really nice on light skin
It's a really good highlighter but gives off a more natural glow but it works great for brow highlight and inner corner of your eyes

I swatches this in the store and I loved it but when I got it it didn't really show up on my face... It is very pretty though for a more natural highlight, but I personally like more bold highlights... It also smells amazing !!!

I swatched this in the store and fell in love. I have very fair skin so finding a highlighter that compliments it without making me look like a ghost is super difficult! So I immediately bought it. Since then, I've tried applying it with the brush it comes with, and two other brushes I have but can barely notice it on my face. I'm super disappointed. I might just return it and get the high beam liquid. I've tried that before and it's beautiful and doesn't feel greasy surprisingly!

I really wanted to like this product...... but it was just a flop for me. this is by far one of the weakest/ least pigmented highlighters I've ever used. It swatches beautifully on the finger, but one applied to the face with a finger/brush/beauty blender it completely disappears.
